boardgame.name: New York 1901
Nowy Jork 1901
紐約 1901
boardgame.description: Relive the dawn of modern New York City, the historic years that made it what it is today. Build bigger and higher skyscrapers on some of Lower Manhattan's most iconic streets. Raise one of four legendary skyscrapers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; the Park Row, the Singer, the Metropolitan Life, or the majestic Woolworth _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and make one of them the crown jewel of your real estate empire!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In New York 1901, the players are building skyscrapers on a map of New York's Financial District. Players take location cards from a card's display and then use 2-3 of those location cards to place Tetris-shaped building tiles on the board. They first build bronze level buildings. Later in the game those buildings can be replaced by silver level and gold level buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This auction is for NateStraight from an auction

Flat iron expansion included 1. Shipping is from 23113 (Midlothian, VA) and paid by the purchaser. 2. Please geekmail me for shipping quote. I am willing to ship through any major carrier (USPS, FedEx, or UPS). Most people prefer USPS as their shipping costs are much more competitive. That being said, please keep in mind the constrained box sizes of priority/regional-boxes (It may not be possible to package the game super well, which could lead to some box damage in transport). 3. Please allow a few days for the games to be shipped. 4. In general, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m careful about the condition of my games but I am not a collector... I often discard advertisements and inserts. Furthermore, most played games were sleeved during play... but any sleeves will be remove before shipping. If you have any questions about the condition/edition/etc of a game, please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask. 5. I reserve the right to cancel purchased based on user’s feedback.
